text: William Riley Dunham (1856–1921) wan an American politician. He was a member of the Indiana General Assembly from 1913 to 1915. He represented Hamilton and Tipton counties.Indiana State Legislator Manual 1913, Indiana General Assembly Biography An issue of the Kempton Courier in 1912 called Dunham "the man known by name by more men, women and children than any other one man in Tipton County". ==Notable family members== *Stanley Armour Dunham (1918–1992), maternal grandfather of Barack Obama, great nephew of William Riley Dunham *Ann Dunham (1942–1995), American anthropologist and mother of Barack Obama, great-great niece of William Riley Dunham *Barack Obama (1961-), 44th President of the United States, great-great-great nephew of William Riley Dunham ==References== Category:Obama family Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Members of the Indiana General Assembly Category:1856 births Category:1921 deaths
title: William Riley Dunham
